title: Initial Warwick - League Video

embed.description: The Warrior has returned, with a need for speed.

body: Just a vid I made, hope you like, this is only the beginning of my content to come

replies.body:
This is pretty good. I especially like how you took the piss out of yourself by showing off several of your deaths, since most people tend to play themselves up as unstoppable juggernauts who do no wrong.

I think my main complaint is that you didn't really keep a specific pattern or theme of content as you went through the video. Each part was pretty good by itself (my particular favorites being the Initial D section and jumping on a doomed Karthus), but when put together, they didn't really form anything that built on each other. It detracts from what the video could be as a whole.

I'll keep an eye out, though!

> [{quoted}](name=Echoing,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=cTY2hPL0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-14T18:56:03.995+0000)
>
> This is pretty good. I especially like how you took the piss out of yourself by showing off several of your deaths, since most people tend to play themselves up as unstoppable juggernauts who do no wrong.
> 
> I think my main complaint is that you didn't really keep a specific pattern or theme of content as you went through the video. Each part was pretty good by itself (my particular favorites being the Initial D section and jumping on a doomed Karthus), but when put together, they didn't really form anything that built on each other. It detracts from what the video could be as a whole.
> 
> I'll keep an eye out, though!

Thank you for your thoughts! I just started out so I know everything's a bit rough, but I am just testing the waters, and I will definitely take your critics into mind for my next videos!

Due to the weird camera angle choices I spent quite a bit of time in the beginning of the video wondering why both team's adc's and supports were top lane at level 4-5, which took away from the experience. That was the biggest issue with some others that aren't super abnormal for first videos. I will sub to check out your future content.

As a whole, pretty good.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=cTY2hPL0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-14T14:21:51.310+0000)
>
> Due to the weird camera angle choices I spent quite a bit of time in the beginning of the video wondering why both team's adc's and supports were top lane at level 4-5, which took away from the experience. That was the biggest issue with some others that aren't super abnormal for first videos. I will sub to check out your future content.
> 
> As a whole, pretty good.

Haha, the problem with the first clip was the river scene was shot in a previous patch, and the game updated so I couldnt go back and complete the scene, but thank you for your thoughts! Thanks for subbing too, it helps me out! :D
